name: Happy 3D Match - Tile Master
description:
Trade your free time with our Happy 3D Match! It's Easy to play but hard to master.

It's time to experience the new match tree puzzle with Happy 3D Match. Let's prove your brain skill of finding and matching puzzle from a tons of our 3D objects from various categories: Cute Animals, Lovely Toys , Fresh Fruits, Delicious Cakes, Beautiful Accessories, Cool Vehicles, etc

Register now or you will miss:

◈ A well-designed 3D game with stylish effect and 3D object.
◈ Unlimited playing time.
◈ Hundreds of rewards for beating challenge levels.
◈ Relax your mind and strengthen your brain at the same time.

Find and tap the same three 3D objects to match them. Each level will has a limited time to complete. Keep playing until you can clear all the tiles. Is it sound simple?

Let's play now and see how far you can go in Happy 3D Match - Match Puzzle.
